About.paragraph: Introducing our premier collection with journalist and world traveler Sommer Shiels

Announce.title: ANNOUNCING A NEW ERA IN NFTS
Announce.paragraph: Unique, one-of-a-kind memories, preserved as immersive virtual reality experiences, individually minted on the blockchain.
